org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.counter

Class HadoopPerformanceCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.counter.HadoopCounterAdapter
      • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.counter.HadoopPerformanceCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, HadoopCounter

    public class HadoopPerformanceCounter
extends HadoopCounterAdapter
    Counter for the job statistics accumulation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
